member.name: APPLICATION_VIEW_STATE
member.summary: Indicates the current view state of a Windows Store app. Used by and .

member.name: APPLICATION_VIEW_STATE.AVS_FULLSCREEN_LANDSCAPE
member.summary: The current app's view is full-screen (has no snapped app adjacent to it), and is in landscape orientation.

member.name: APPLICATION_VIEW_STATE.AVS_FILLED
member.summary: The current app's view has been reduced to a partial screen view as the result of another app snapping (being docked at one side of the screen in a narrow view).

member.name: APPLICATION_VIEW_STATE.AVS_SNAPPED
member.summary: The current app's view has been snapped (docked at one side of the screen in a narrow view).

member.name: APPLICATION_VIEW_STATE.AVS_FULLSCREEN_PORTRAIT
member.summary: The current app's view is full-screen (has no snapped app adjacent to it), and is in portrait orientation.
